header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.activity: Couple go for a walk in the countryside.

body.u: right so we're finally going then
I know it's almost difficult to believe now
yeah do you think they've booked the ticket?
hmm?
well they should tell us on Saturday shouldn't they
Saturday yeah yeah and they're on holiday today so holiday tomorrow
yeah he said he's passed it on to someone called V
yeah who's this? See I was confused cos he used so much text speak in his email I was trying to work out whether V was some sort of code for something else
yeah
I was like what? I mean surely her whoever's name it doesn't it isn't just a V is it so and we don't know who they are so
yeah it's probably difficult to pronounce
I was wondering if it meant we we will buy your ticket
what with a German accent?
yeah once we've got that ticket see the thing that worries me is getting back in in August
yeah
and you know how quickly we can ask them look when are our? When are the August? When's the August break? Cos you said we could have August off when can we book our flight back for?
yeah
I mean should we ask that before we go?
well maybe we should send an email just
there's a few things you know
yeah I mean it's all been agreed upon before
but I don't want to sound like a cow I don't want to sound like cos already there's been so many emails especially from me saying well what about this and what about that? Because because of
yeah well they haven't been very forthcoming with information
no no not at all and they it seemed like they were quite offended by my questioning so it's like oh do you just take it on faith
yeah well it's quite a big thing just moving half way across the world

yeah yeah they should understand that but if you look at erm who works in that department I mean there there's a lot of p a lot of people from all over the world but from English speaking countries you've got the In Indian lot and then erm you've got erm it looks like somebody may be from Eastern Europe actually I think I don't know she looks quite funky anyway er got all these colours and looks really nice
mm huh
and er then I don't know there's there's the bloke at the top sounds like he's got some sort of Western name and then two women
okay
that's it
what in the department?
well no and all the rest are from India or from Oman or from the maybe a few other places
oh really? So there's no other English people there?
there's just it looks like there might be three
okay
but they might who knows where they're from? I don't know
ah well it's time to get excited now though

there's probably well there probably are more there probably are more they've just got names that I don't recognize but like their recruitment thing it doesn't look like they're that experienced with getting people over it's not the colleges of technology and they're just like yeah get loads and loads of erm people from English speaking countries to come
yeah mm
they seem this university seems more local we want to support the local I mean that's what they say on their thing
yeah
omanis get preference to anybody else apart from maybe the English language speaking courses
well that's good

yeah yeah yeah it should be interesting the guy at the top I've forgotten his name now I was trying to look at their names so that when we meet them I'll be able to remember at bit easier you know what it's like
yeah
you have like
well you get introduced by to a hundred people
forty yeah and then you're e and then you have to try and remember everybody
and then you introduce yourself to someone and they say oh we've already met
yeah
oh sorry

yeah so yeah I I might I might keep just having a look at the pic cos they've got the pictures and the names and just every day have a look and read through you never know it might help when when it comes to meeting them in person
yeah
so yeah it's it's going to be exciting
yeah
but you said that there's no direct flight
there's a direct well from what I can see there's a direct flight from Gatwick
really? That's strange I thought Heathrow would go
yeah there was the erm Gulf Air but Gulf Air has just been bought out by Bahrain and they're not doing the flight
Gulf Air's been bought out by?
Bahrain
Bahrain?
well it said something like that
really?

oh so we're going to have to go to Bahrain first?

Emirates is that Dubai?
er
yeah
yeah

ouch
it's a longer flight than I thought

is it longer than that?
yeah it's at least eight
oh shit oh well the good thing I suppose is we're only gonna be working five miles from the airport
yeah I'm happy about that I'm glad we didn't take the Salalah job like just the big
yeah that's quite nice just for going on holidays or coming back here
yeah yeah or

and just having the big city so near

yeah which is maybe what we should have told them I don't know

we should have said whichever one's easiest

ah no surely not

no I think that's probably the most exhausted I've ever been in my life actually
yeah why?

why? I don't know

no we didn't even have any money
and then you got Bird Flu
or whatever it was yeah
it was a bit of a disaster that wasn't it

so Wednesday they might just let us settle in

yeah I'd like some time just them kind of showing us the ropes at British Council we got a week didn't we
mm mhm mhm yeah
I can't see them giving us a week
more than that I think we got ten days induction didn't we?
yeah I can't see that kind cos I don't they'd have an induction process in place cos like you said they're not used to flying people over

food yeah yeah yeah I won't be cooking for a while

it's all year I think
no it can't be

no idea

just worried about a house as well we had such a beautiful house in Tunisia
yeah
oh such a beautiful house

yes yeah well I think around Muscat it will be fairly

fairly Westernised

like typical tourists do

if they didn't approve of something I was wearing and I was only wearing it because I didn't have anything else you know

well especially if we're paying for a hotel

yeah yeah well that works itself out though doesn't it there's no point

can't you?

it's they're not so many everybody has their own car so there's less taxis unless people drink you know in Tunisia they still drank quite a lot didn't they and so they didn't want to drive or something and the women travelled on there own quite a lot so you'd get a lot of the women getting taxis and a lot of the students getting taxis to school because like the whole family was working
well surely that's the same isn't it? I mean how are the students going to get to school?

mm oh I don't know but we'll see won't we
